page.title: 04POPULATION
page.content: The two main villages in this area are West Wratting with a population of 450 and West Wickham with a population of 380. Most of the people live in the villages or in houses attached to the main farms. There is a mix of elderly, new- comers and a few people who have always lived in the villages. The area contains a mixture of social classes. School children from the whole area attend Balsham Primary School or Linton Village College. These are both out of the area and the children travel by school bus. The oldest inhabitant of West Wratting is a man aged 96 years. The only "holiday homes" are a few near Weston Green owned by the more elite.
